title: Charming Northbrae bungalow
posting_body: Charming bungalow located in the Northbrae neighborhood in north Berkeley.

two bedrooms (primary bedroom with walk-in closet), bathroom with shower/tub, large living room with wood burning fireplace; large dining room with built-in cabinets; washer dryer laundry, dishwasher; hardwood floors throughout, hallway linen pantry, off Street parking (as well as non-permit street parking), central heating, small back patio, 30amp  240volt exterior outlet for EV charging
20-minute walk to North Berkeley BART station (1.5 miles)
2 blocks from King public pool, King Jr. High w/ after school hour’s track & field, tennis courts, etc.;

15 minute walk Shattuck Commons shopping and Farmers' market Thursday, near Solano Ave., Gourmet Ghetto, Monterey Market, and Natural Grocery;  walk to Oak Park with kid’s playground, tennis courts, & basketball courts.
One year lease, 1st and last month rent, security deposit, $500 pet fee (if applicable)
PG&E, water, cable, internet - NOT included
